page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content:
The following people were responsible for putting together the information on these pages:- {From Williamsburgh Primary School:} Primary 6-1 and Mrs I. Hughes Headteacher - Mrs M. Young Assistant Head - Mrs F. Howe
{From St. James Primary School: Primary 7 and Mr O. McDermott{ { {From Paisley Grammar School: Mr W. Henderson - Geography Principal The Geography pupils of S5
Many others contributed by answering questions, allowing visits to places of interest and visiting the schools to give talks. Many thanks to all concerned, too numerous to mention.
